explanation: [0-0] In the kitchen, a man in a yellow short-sleeved T-shirt sits at a white table, holding tomato slices in both hands. There are several plates and a bottle of ketchup on the table. The plates contain hamburger buns, tomato slices, meat patties, and cheese slices respectively. Behind him, a woman in a pink short-sleeved T-shirt and black pants stands at the cabinet with her back to the camera, holding a cup. Various tableware is placed in the cabinet.

The woman behind him puts the cup in her hand on the cabinet, closes the cabinet door, walks to the man's side while wiping her hands, and shows an excited expression.
